deploy.startCommand: echo 'Environment check...' && echo 'RAILS_ENV:' $RAILS_ENV && echo 'RAILS_MASTER_KEY:' $RAILS_MASTER_KEY && echo 'DATABASE_URL:' $DATABASE_URL && bundle exec rails db:migrate && echo 'Migrations completed, starting Rails server...' && bundle exec rails server -b 0.0.0.0 -p $PORT -e production
